ActorTalk: So lame! For a massive place like Babylonia, there's not even one decent opponent to be found. What a total letdown!
Whoa, keep it down, will you? Your last comment has made the opposing players mad...

Hmph! There's no shame in admitting defeat! What I can't stand are those who clearly lost but stand there mumbling excuses about "momentary slip-ups," "not being in top form," or "simple carelessness"... I have zero respect for those people!
Maybe... don't humiliate people like that?
Gray Raven Commandant? Sorry you had to see that.
Early today, this Kuroro showed up out of nowhere and immediately broke our highest score. It's been hanging around ever since, claiming to be "searching for worthy opponents."
The problem is, whenever other players fail the challenge, it starts taunting them with all kinds of vicious trash talk... Several players have already been humiliated so badly that they just left.
Seriously, when are you going to leave? You're intimidating everyone just by standing there. Nobody wants to play anymore!
I won't leave until I find a truly skilled challenger.
Gray Raven Commandant? Interesting. Finally, someone noteworthy. So, do you have what it takes to break my record?
Such confidence! Very well, if you can manage to break my record, I'll do whatever you ask.
Phew, with the Gray Raven Commandant here, I can finally relax. At least now this troublemaker might behave... I'm counting on you!
If I win, you have to come with me. What do you say?
